issue.title: Laser and stereo data misalignment (unrelated to diff between visual and collision geom)

content.html:
Here's a patch to try:

diff -r 1a69666680ab gazebo/physics/MultiRayShape.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/MultiRayShape.cc   Sat Apr 13 18:17:01 2013 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/physics/MultiRayShape.cc   Sun Apr 14 16:53:55 2013 -0700
@@ -113,7 +113,7 @@
     gzthrow(stream.str());
   }

-  return this->rays[_index]->GetLength();
+  return this->GetRangeMin() + this->rays[_index]->GetLength(); 
 }

 //////////////////////////////////////////////////

It'll take a bit of work to get the tests updated to adapt to this change.
